name: Five Nights at Uncanny's
description:
Backstory:

A guy named The CJ Planets was tired of making MIBU memes, so he has decided to go to Uncanny's and get a pizza from there. but two guys named Evad666 and Gold XD told him he should get a part time night shift job at here, so The CJ Planets decided to go to the office and work on there

Characters:

Phase 1: the first phase in Uncanny's. probably will be active in Night 3, spawns in the stage and appears on the right door

Phase 2: the second phase, he will be activate at Night 1, spawns in the stage and appears on the left door

Phase 2: the third phase, he will be activate at Night 2, spawns in the stage and appears on the right door

The CJ Planets: main protagonist of the game, based on the real CJ Planets, a 13 year old british boy who went to Uncanny's to get a pizza. but then one of his friends Evad666 and Gold XD went to tell him that he will have his first night shift

Objective:

Survive all 5 nights to beat the game

Locations:

Office: a place where The CJ Planets spawns in, where he has to check the cameras, lights and even doors

Right Hallway and Corner: two places where both Phase 1 and 3 last spawns in

Left Hallway and Corner: two places where Phase 2 last spawns in

Bathroom: a location where both Phase 1 and 3 can spawn in

The Hall of Fame Room: a special location with DusttaleImpostor and The CJ Planet's play buttons, is where both 2 and 3 spawns in

Stage: a location where every phase attends a meme, this is the first spawn of Phase 1,2 and 3.

Feedback:

Send any feedback to me what should i update this game or add features in the sequel

Question: is there gonna be a sequel?

A: yes!
